A

addCreature(Creature) - Method in class Inventory
Adds a creature to the inventory, If there's no active creature, the added creature becomes the active creature.
Area - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents the area with specified width and height.
Area(int, int) - Constructor for class Area
Creates a new area with the given width and height.

B

BattlePhase - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a battle phase between the player and an enemy creature.
BattlePhase(Creature, Character) - Constructor for class BattlePhase
Creates a new battle phase with the given enemy creature and player.

C

changeActiveCreature(Creature) - Method in class Inventory
Removes a creature from the inventory.
Character - Class in Unnamed Package
Reperesents a character in the game with a name and an inventory of creatures.
Character(String) - Constructor for class Character
Creates a new character with the given name.
Creature - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a creature with a name, type, family, and evolution level.
Creature(String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class Creature
Creates a new creature with the given name, type, family, and evolution level.
CreatureDatabase - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a database of creatures, specifically for evolution level 1 (EL1) creatures.
CreatureDatabase() - Constructor for class CreatureDatabase
Creates a new creature database with the list of EL1 creatures.

E

EL1_CREATURES - Variable in class CreatureDatabase
The list of EL1 creatures in the database.
equals(Object) - Method in class Type
Checks if the given ibject is equal to this type.

G

The entry point for the Pokemon version 2.0 game.
GameLauncher() - Constructor for class GameLauncher
 
getActiveCreature() - Method in class Inventory
Returns the active creature in the inventory.
getCreatures() - Method in class Inventory
Returns the list of creatures in the inventory.
getCurrentPosition() - Method in class Area
Returns the current position in the format "[X, Y]".
getEvolutionLevel() - Method in class Creature
Returns the evolution level of the creature.
getFamily() - Method in class Creature
Returns the family of the creature.
getInventory() - Method in class Character
Returns the inventory of the character.
getName() - Method in class Character
Returns the name of the character.
getName() - Method in class Creature
Returns the name of the creature.
getType() - Method in class Creature
Returns the type of the creature.
getWidth() - Method in class Area
Returns the height of the area.

I

Inventory - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents an inventory containing a list of creatures and an active creature.
Inventory() - Constructor for class Inventory
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class GameLauncher
Main method that launches the game.
move(int) - Method in class Area
Moves the current position based on the specified direction.

P

PlayGame - Class in Unnamed Package
Handles the game flow and character interactions for "Pokemon version 2.0".
PlayGame() - Constructor for class PlayGame
 

S

start() - Method in class BattlePhase
Starts the battle phase.
startGame() - Method in class PlayGame
Starts the game, guides the user through the character setup, and allows exploration.

T

Returns the name of the type as a string.
Type - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a type of creature, such as FIRE, WATER, or GRASS.
